sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Youth in Care Timely Provision of Essential Care Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Youth in Care Timely Provision of Essential Care Act.

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly finds that:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds that:

sections.heading: Improving access to residential treatment, evidence-based alternatives to residential treatment, and specialized foster care
sections.text: The Department of Children and Family Services shall develop a written, strategic plan that comprehensively addresses improving timely access to quality in-state residential

sections.heading: Implementation.  The strategic plan developed by the Department of Children and Family Services shall be finalized and made public no later than one year after the effective date of this Act
sections.text: The strategic plan shall be revised within 6 months after the rate study required under Section 35.11 of the
